akn:section.akn:heading: Budget request for school construction funds for Director of Dependents’ Education

akn:content.akn:p: § 925. Budget request for school construction funds for Director of Dependents’ Education The President shall include in his budget for each fiscal year a separate request for funds for construction of school facilities by the Director. (Pub. L. 95–561, title XIV, § 1406, Nov. 1, 1978, 92 Stat. 2367.)
